column1: |                                                                                                      | For Freight trains going towards the Redbridge | Approach Control                           | {1}            |

|                                                                                                      | For Freight trains leaving the Redbridge Goods | Speed Differential                         | {1⁄2}*         |

|                                                                                                      | Freight trains leaving the Redbridge Goods     | Speed Differential                         | {1}*           |

|                                                                                                      | Between all movements except as below          |                                            | 3              |

|                                                                                                      | Up Bournemouth Line train                      | Down Romsey Line train                     | 11⁄2           |

|                                                                                                      | Freight to/from Redbridge Goods crossing       | Conflicting train arrives/passes Redbridge | 5              |

|                                                                                                      | Down Passenger pass Redbridge to Totton        | Down freight departs from Redbridge Goods  | 2              |

|                                                                                                      | Down train arrives in Redbridge Platform 2     | Train crossing to/from Redbridge Goods     |                |

| Down train towards Brockenhurst                                                                      | Up train departing Fawley Loops                | 2                                          |                |

| Down train towards Brockenhurst                                                                      | Down train towards Fawley Loops                | 3                                          |                |

| Down train towards Fawley Loops                                                                      | Down train towards Brockenhurst                | 4                                          |                |

| Up train from Brockenhurst                                                                           | Up train from Fawley Loops                     | 3                                          |                |

| Up train from Fawley Loops                                                                           | Up train from Brockenhurst                     | 4                                          |                |

| Up train arrives/passes Platform 1 from Fawley                                                       | Down train departs Platform 2                  | 1#                                         |                |

| Trains from Redbridge must not be planned to reverse in Platform 2 to depart back towards Redbridge. |                                                |                                            |                |

| Down Main Line arrivals Platform 1 or 4                                                              | Approach Control                               | {1}                                        |                |
